title: OKX fined $2.6M in Netherlands for unlicensed operations ahead of MiCA rollout
summary: OKX hit with $2.6M fine by Dutch National Bank for unregistered operations in Netherlands pre-MiCA.

body.raw:
![ OKX fined $2.6M in Netherlands for unlicensed operations ahead of MiCA rollout ](https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/528_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjQtMTEvMDE5MzJlOWQtMDdiNy03NmJmLWJmNmEtMDY2YjFhODkwNWMw.jpg)

OKX hit with $2.6M fine by Dutch National Bank for unregistered operations in Netherlands pre-MiCA.
